title: Keeping Kate
description: Orphan Kate Evans is determined to make a life for herself on a Utah ranch, taking care of a little girl named Addie. But when she meets her irritable employer, Kate is forced to confront the past she's been running fromâ€”and face a future she never dreamed possible. This latter-day twist on the classic Jane Eyre is a romantic and gripping read.
author: Lauren Winder Farnsworth
